titleStmt.title: A New and short defense of tabacco with the effectes of the same, and of the right vse thereof.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by V.S. for Clement Knight, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Holy Lambe in Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Running title: A defence of tabacco.
Copy at reel 2270:7 is an improved filming over that on reel 1750.
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Holy Lambe in Paules Church-yard
